item.title: Slideshows
item.dc:creator: vortex
item.content:encoded:
FlexSlider

You can generate a flexiSlider by uploading multiple images to a post or page and generate a slideshow using shortcodes ( from shortcode generator ) [hr_padding] [flexislideshow]
